item.title: LT Foods announces manufacturing facility in Raichur, Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[The facility will cater to regional rice varieties, including Sona Masoori and Kolam
LT Foods has announced a new manufacturing facility in Raichur, Karnataka, for regional rice varieties, including Sona Masoori and Kolam. Varieties such as Sona Masoori and Kolam are staples in South Indian households, with Sona Masoori enjoying widespread acceptance beyond Karnataka, in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and among the global Indian diaspora.
The new facility will have an initial estimated production ...]]>
item.author: Sanjiv Das
